ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] minotaur horn change?
ygData.msgSnippet: I believe what Sylly means is... Make dropping stuff work the same way that destroy works now.  You can turn a 2nd chance screen on and off at your discretion.
ygData.messageBody:
I believe what Sylly means is...

Make dropping stuff work the same way that destroy works now. You can turn
a 2nd chance screen on and off at your discretion.

Tomerrilin

-----Original Message-----
From: Jeffrey Sue [mailto:jsue@...]
Sent: Friday, June 02, 2000 12:31 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] minotaur horn change?


At 08:55 AM 6/2/00 -0500, you wrote:
>All items should be player controllable wrt dropping.
>
>My MM drums were a gift as were several other fine things. I have given
>some nice gifts to folks as well.
>
>I would *hate* to see all things become no drops.
>
>Sylly

sure, and then i'm on rallos zek, low on health after killing something. ok
turn
all my items no drop so that if i get jumped by a pk they can't loot me.
too
exploitable.
